title: rounded logo font?
content:
I’ve been looking for the font to this logo for ages. The pics attached. The logo is from the blog.iminlikewithyou.com  
I cant identify it, i’ve been comparing to a lot of fonts and can’t find the right one. please help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [likewithyou.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009163814/http:/typophile.com/files/likewithyou.png) | 6.58 KB |

 [‹ The Academy Is.. album font ID help.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009163814/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49702 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009163814/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49695 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chickenandmayo

comments.content:
Not sure what font that is but it appears that the weight has been increased manually, so perhaps you should be looking for a less bold matching typeface.

Your best bet may be to email the site owner.
